title: Can I score 90+ in RBSE board? - Quora

response.answer_text: YES you can,if you follow the following tips: first of all you have to concentrate on studies and have to do daily study work..1. wake up early morning and study for 2 hrs daily.2. practice previous papers and prepare yourself a bunch of questions in your mind.3.keep mind peaceful by doing yoga and meditation.4. concentrate on important topics.5. at night do revision and complete the syllabus as early as possible6. do revision for at least 6 to 10 times until you get answers to all the questions in mind..7. discuss a lot with your friends if u do this steps properly u can get highest score in your exam . If you want to Score 95%+ do two things Do NCERT Thoroughly Solve Last 10 year paper (for all subjects) I also have a suggestion of an application Oyeexams Available at Google Play Store which can help you to make RBSE Board exam easy.·
